article_title: The Good News, Bad News And Ideas To Jump-Start 2014 Business Tax Planning

article_metadata.author: Steve Parrish

og.description: Now that the New Year has begun, my phone calls have increased. Many involve what I consider “taxpayer’s remorse.” Business owners, in particular, have come to realize they missed the opportunity for some 2013 tax savings and have vowed to get ahead of these tax issues in their 2014 business [...]
